title: Power from Kiewa
brief_description: The multiple uses of water are investigated in the Kiewa Hydro-Electric Scheme. The efficient management of water in the catchment area, production of electricity in hydro-electric power stations and regulations of water in the Kiewa Valley are highlighted.
